    • Constructor Detail

      • OsmMBTileSource

        protected OsmMBTileSource(int minZoom,
                          int maxZoom,
                          int tileSizePixels,
                          android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db)
        The reason this constructor is protected is because all parameters, except file should be determined from the archive file. Therefore a factory method is necessary.

    • Method Detail

      • createFromFile

        public static OsmMBTileSource createFromFile(java.io.File file)
        Creates a new MBTileSource from file.

        Parameters minZoom, maxZoom en tileSizePixels are obtained from the database. If they cannot be obtained from the DB, the default values as defined by this class are used.

        protected static int getInt(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db,
